√sphūrj 'rumble'

present: [1.] sphū́rjati etc. AV.+  

[perfect: pusphūrja  apusphūrjat  asphūrjīt  sphūṇjiṣyati  sphūrjitā  ]

verbal: sphūrjita E.+  -sphūrjya  

secondary: intensive: posphūrj-   -- desiderative: pusphūrjiṣa-   -- causative: sphūrjáyati etc. V.+  

derivatives: sphūrja  sphū́rjaka B.+  -sphūṇjana C.  -sphūrjathu C.  -sphūrji C.
